snippet: The distillers have stashed away inventories of five million barrels — at a time when they could sell even more than they are producing.
abstract: Kentucky bourbon makers are producing large stockpiles of bourbon, banking on continued international demand from places like China and increased popularity in United States; production has surged more than 150 percent in last 15 years in Kentucky, where 95 percent of world's bourbon is produced.
lead_paragraph: The distillers have stashed away inventories of five million barrels — at a time when they could sell even more than they are producing.

headline.main: Kentucky Bourbon Makers See Bright Future
headline.print_headline: Kentucky Bourbon Makers See Bright Future
